Define Documentation

#define VECADDISFAC (   v1,
  v3,
  fac 
)
Value:
{   \
    *(v1 + 0) += *(v3 + 0) * (fac); \
    *(v1 + 1) += *(v3 + 1) * (fac); \
    *(v1 + 2) += *(v3 + 2) * (fac); \
}

Referenced by shade_material_loop().
